name: @nounsbr/subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes nounsbr events
author: NoundersBR

scripts.deploy:hardhat: yarn clean && yarn prepare:hardhat && yarn codegen && yarn create:localnode nounsbr/nounsbr-testnet && yarn deploy:localnode nounsbr/nounsbr-testnet
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn clean && yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && yarn deploy nounsbr/nounsbr-subgraph-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && yarn deploy nounsbr/nounsbr-mainnet
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn clean && yarn prepare:goerli && yarn codegen && yarn deploy nounsbr/nounsbr-testnet
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn clean && yarn prepare:sepolia && yarn codegen && yarn deploy nounsbr/nounsbr-sepolia
